title: Folk music style modelling using LSTMs
author: bjt2n3904
content: readme.md folk music style modelling using lstms code was used the following published works:sturm, santos korshunova, "folk music style modelling recurrent neural networks long short term memory units", late-breaking demo the 2015 int. symposium music information retrievalsturm, santos, ben-tal korshunova, "music transcription modelling composition using deep learning", proc. 1st conf. computer simulation musical creativity, huddersfield, uk, july 2016.sturm ben-tal, "machine folk music composed ai shows technologys creative side" https://theconversation.com/machine-folk-music-composed--ai-shows-technologys-creative-side-74708 folk-rnn session book volume 1 10 https://highnoongmt.wordpress.com/2016/09/12/folk-rnn-session-tunes-volume-1--10/sturm ben-tal, bringing models to music practice: evaluation deep learning approaches music transcription modelling generation, j. creative music systems, 2016 ( press). code was used create following music compositions:"bastard tunes" oded ben-tal + folk-rnn (2017)
